Class BookingController

java.lang.Object
com.yash.MovieBooking.controller.BookingController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/bookings") public class BookingController extends Object
REST controller for handling movie booking related requests.

    • book

      @GetMapping("/showtimes") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<ShowtimeDTO>> book(@RequestParam("movieId") int mid)
      Retrieves available showtimes for a given movie.
      Parameters:
      mid - The ID of the movie.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing a list of ShowtimeDTOs.

    • bookings

      @GetMapping("/seats") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<SeatDTO>> bookings(@RequestParam("showtimeId") int showtimeId)
      Retrieves available seats for a given showtime.
      Parameters:
      showtimeId - The ID of the showtime.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing a list of SeatDTOs.

    • processBooking

      @PostMapping("/process") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<BookingDTO> processBooking(@RequestBody BookingRequestDTO bookingRequestDTO)
      Processes a booking request.
      Parameters:
      bookingRequestDTO - The booking request data.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the saved BookingDTO.

    • getBokingbyuid

      @GetMapping("/view/{userId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<BookingDTO>> getBokingbyuid(@PathVariable int userId)
      Retrieves bookings for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing a list of BookingDTOs.

    • delete

      @DeleteMapping("/{bookingId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> delete(@PathVariable int bookingId)
      Deletes a booking.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - The ID of the booking to delete.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with no content.

    • adminDashboard

      @GetMapping("/adminboard") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,Object>> adminDashboard()
      Retrieves admin dashboard data.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing a map with admin dashboard information.
